item.title: Cheezscape 80 source, How do i become admin?
item.dc:creator: @pooinsky pooinsky
item.description:
@pooinsky wrote:

I just downloaded cheezscape 80 source, i opened it and searched for

//start of moderator/admin

So it came up with that. Underneith that on others sources usually says this where u can put your name into it =

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURNAME")) { playerRights = 3; }

It wasnt like that it was like this =

checkmods(); checkadmins(); checkstaff(); if(checkmods() == 5) playerRights = 1; if(checkadmins() == 5) playerRights = 2; if(checkstaff(gen) == 5) playerRights = 3;

So can anybody tell me how i can make myself admin?

Read full topic
item.source: Cheezscape 80 source, How do i become admin?
